laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 39.0%, then dropped to 23.2% upon admission at another hospital, and stabilized at 26.3% on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant decrease from 39.0% to 23.2% over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 12.7 g/dL, then dropped to 7.9 g/dL upon admission at another hospital, and stabilized at 8.2 g/dL on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant decrease from 12.7 g/dL to 7.9 g/dL.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 5200 per mm3, rose to 16,300 per mm3 upon admission at another hospital, and then peaked at 20,000 per mm3 on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Rising trend observed: from 5200 to 20,000 per mm3.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 0.74 mg/dL, rose to 6.60 mg/dL upon admission at another hospital, and further increased to 6.79 mg/dL on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Consistent increase from 0.74 mg/dL to 6.79 mg/dL.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 18 mg/dL, rose to 140 mg/dL upon admission at another hospital, then decreased to 122 mg/dL on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase from 18 mg/dL to 140 mg/dL, followed by a decrease.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 4.4 mmol/L, rose to 6.0 mmol/L upon admission at another hospital, then decreased to 4.0 mmol/L on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Peak at 6.0 mmol/L followed by a decrease.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Consistent levels of 141 mmol/L on the day before admission and the second day at this hospital.
Initially 152 mg/dL, then decreased to 142 mg/dL on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight decrease from 152 mg/dL to 142 mg/dL.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially 4.4 g/dL, then decreased to 2.8 g/dL upon admission at another hospital, and later increased to 3.1 g/dL on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 4.4 g/dL to 2.8 g/dL, then increased to 3.1 g/dL.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially at 274 U/L, rose to 914 U/L upon admission at another hospital, peaking at 2930 U/L on the second day at this hospital.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Dramatic increase from 274 U/L to 2930 U/L.
